name: Anthony RILEY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
